name: wiki-go
description: wiki-go is a lightweight self-hosted wiki engine written in Go. It focuses on simplicity, markdown-based pages, fast performance, and easy deployment, making it suitable for small documentation sites and personal knowledge bases.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write and edit wiki pages using markdown syntax for simple formatting

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Benefit from Go's efficiency with quick page loads and minimal resource usage

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Store wiki content as plain text files for easy backup and version control

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find content quickly with full-text search across all wiki pages

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track page changes over time with built-in revision history and diff viewing

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and embed images or files within wiki pages
